This looks great. Overall very strong, and great new paragraph addition by too. I made a bunch of small 
formatting changes, and shortened one cite, and otherwise no comments at all. Onward.

Sent from my iPhone

much for all your incredible work on this,—

read first and then the other stuff and then circle up.
